content.question: A laser beam is shone on two different slabs of material, and data on the incident angle <math alttext="theta sub 1" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> and refracted angle <math alttext="theta sub 2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> of the ray is recorded. The graph shows a best-fit line to the data for each of the slabs. Which of the following is correct about the indices of refraction <math alttext="n" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>n</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> of the materials?

choices.label: <math alttext="n sub x, is greater than n sub y" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>n</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>X</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mrow><mi>n</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>Y</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="n sub x equals n sub y" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>n</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>X</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mrow><mi>n</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>Y</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="n sub x, is less than n sub y" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>n</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>X</mtext></mrow></msub><mo><</mo><msub><mrow><mi>n</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>Y</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

Either <math alttext="n sub x, is greater than n sub y" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>n</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>X</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mrow><mi>n</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>Y</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> or <math alttext="n sub x, is less than n sub y" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>n</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>X</mtext></mrow></msub><mo><</mo><msub><mrow><mi>n</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>Y</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>, but which is true cannot be determined from the graph.

content.answer: <math alttext="n sub x, is less than n sub y" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>n</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>X</mtext></mrow></msub><mo><</mo><msub><mrow><mi>n</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>Y</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
